transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Good morning sir, Utkarsh bol raha IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir, ek kal call disconnect ho gaya tha jo aapne na miski not satisfied diya tha sir, maine uske liye aapko call kiya hai.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, ek minute aaj ek new hai mere, usko thoda samjhao ki kaise work karna hota hai isme.
Executive: Ah kitne to abhi call pe hai wo baat karwaiye ji mere, baat karwaiye meri.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, ji sir namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Ah actually mai IndiaMART se Utkarsh baat kar raha hu, mai aapko na thoda sa guide karunga IndiaMART matlab kaise aapko use karna hai.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Dekhiye in dekhiye IndiaMART me kya hai na sir ki hamare paas me char sources hai business ke ek aapko jo sir ko direct call aati hai, thik hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur dusri cheez direct inquiry aati hai.
Executive: Aur teesri cheez bylead hoti hai, bylead.
Executive: Bylead me kya hota hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's previous call was disconnected.

- Wants executive to explain IndiaMART usage to new employee.



Resolution:

- Executive called regarding disconnected call.

- Executive started explaining how to use IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- indiamart, buyleads, inquiry, calls
